scripts.build:dev: npm run build:web && npm run build:lib:dev && npm run build:app:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:web && npm run build:lib:prod && npm run build:app:prod
scripts.build:release: npm run build:release:ci && npm run sign-package
scripts.build:release:ci: npm run format:fix && npm run lint:fix && npm run version-sync && npm run manifest-git-hash && npm run build:prod
scripts.lint: cd playlet-lib && npm run lint && cd ../playlet-app && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd playlet-lib && npm run lint:fix && cd ../playlet-app && npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: cd playlet-lib && npm run format && cd ../playlet-app && npm run format
scripts.format:fix: cd playlet-lib && npm run format:fix && cd ../playlet-app && npm run format:fix
scripts.test: npm run test:lib && npm run test:app
scripts.test:build: npm run test:build:lib && npm run test:build:app
scripts.update-rale-component: cd tools/RALE && rm TrackerTask.xml && curl -o TrackerTask.zip https://devtools.web.roku.com/roku-advanced-layout-editor/app/TrackerTask.zip && unzip TrackerTask.zip && rm TrackerTask.zip
scripts.postinstall: cd playlet-lib && npm install && cd ../playlet-app && npm install && cd ../playlet-web && npm install
scripts.update-deps: npx npm-check-updates -u && cd playlet-app && npx npm-check-updates -u && cd ../playlet-lib && npx npm-check-updates -u && cd ../playlet-web && npx npm-check-updates -u
